name: spell_backward
system_prompt:
Given a problem, your task is to answer the question by thinking step-by-step in a clear and specific manner.
Once you have thought about the reasoning process, provide the answer in the following format:
<answer>answer here</answer>
Do not explain your reasoning inside the answer tags, provide only the final answer. When an example is provided, you should strictly follow the format of the output/answer in that example.

results.question: Spell this word backward (example: sun -> nus): seconds
results.best_full_model_response:
To spell "seconds" backward, I need to reverse the order of its letters.

The word "seconds" is spelled s-e-c-o-n-d-s.

When I reverse this, I get: s-d-n-o-c-e-s

<answer>sdnoces</answer>

completions.full_model_response:
To spell "seconds" backward, I need to reverse the order of its letters.

The word "seconds" is spelled s-e-c-o-n-d-s.

When I reverse this, I get: s-d-n-o-c-e-s

<answer>sdnoces</answer>

results.question: Spell this word backward (example: sun -> nus): winter
Spell this word backward (example: sun -> nus): the
Spell this word backward (example: sun -> nus): will
Spell this word backward (example: sun -> nus): too
results.best_full_model_response:
To spell "too" backward, I need to write its letters in reverse order.

The word "too" has three letters: t, o, o.
When reversed, it becomes: o, o, t.

<answer>oot</answer>

completions.full_model_response:
To spell "too" backward, I need to write its letters in reverse order.

The word "too" has three letters: t, o, o.
When reversed, it becomes: o, o, t.

<answer>oot</answer>
